mapper.insert: INSERT INTO plt_org_city (fid, city_code, STATUS ) SELECT fid, #{cityCode}, 1 FROM plt_open_org WHERE org_name IN (${orgNames}) AND fid NOT IN ( SELECT fid FROM plt_org_city );
INSERT INTO plt_org_city (fid, city_code, STATUS ) SELECT fid, #{cityCode}, 1 FROM plt_open_org WHERE org_name IN (${orgNames}) AND fid NOT IN ( SELECT fid FROM plt_org_city );
